column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Overall I really enjoyed my experience here. I had the Jinya Tonkotsu Black
column2: and it was delicious though slightly on the saltier side. Also
column3: the Pork Chashu here is amazing! You can either combo it with your ramen
column6: which is what I'll probably do next time! Service here is also good despite how busy it can get.
